title: Music (CRE213)
description:
A Classic RISK! episode from our first two years! In the thirteenth episode of our second season, Brian Huskey, Eric Andre, Smith Galtney, Jesse Krakow and Nina Mozes share stories of weird scenes inside the world of song.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Make a one-time donation to RISK! at PayPal.me/RISKshow

Get tickets to RISK! live shows at RISK-show.com/tour

Get the RISK! book at TheRISKBook.com

Take our storytelling classes at TheStoryStudio.org

Hire Kevin Allison to make a personalized video at Cameo.com/TheKevinAllison

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Brian Huskey, Eric Andre, Smith Galtney, Jesse Krakow, Kevin Allison, Nina Moses, Slothbear, Ruckus Roboticus, D.J. Lobsterdust, Mike Phirman)
